generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- building: A large modern building with glass windows is visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A few pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a gray Audi sedan in the foreground and a gray Volkswagen van to its left.
- bus: A bus is visible on the far left side of the image, driving in the opposite direction.

- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles above the road ahead.
